Actions.ActionName: Set variables to be used in AppleScript according to front screen

ElseActions.ActionName: Search Variable “Typinator_screenRes” to get resolution variables for second screen

ThenActions.ActionName: Search Variable “Typinator_screenRes” to get resolution variables for main screen

Actions.ActionName: Filter out formatting in case word is part of a list
Determine if word has trailing space

Actions.Text:
----------------------------------------------------------
# Author:					Chris Thomerson (@cdthomer)
# Current Version:		1.6 (Added script to set focus to Correction field [Friday, January 21, 2022])
# Version History:		1.5 (Added script to determine if there are any suggestions [Thursday, January 20, 2022])
#							1.4 (Switched to local variables [Tuesday, January 18, 2022])
#							1.3 (Added script to set Typinator window position)
#							1.2 (Added selecting English auto correction)
#							1.1 (Combined all previous scripts into this script)
#							1.0 (Initial script)
# Created:				Monday, September 6, 2021
# Modified:				Thursday, January 20, 2022
# macOS:				11.5.2 (Big Sur), 12.1 (Monterey)
# tags:					Typinator
#
# DISCLAIMER
# Permission to use, copy, modify, and/or distribute this
# software for any purpose with or without fee is hereby granted.
#
# THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND THE AUTHOR DISCLAIMS ALL
# WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS SOFTWARE INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED
# WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS. IN NO EVENT SHALL
# THE AUTHOR BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, DIRECT, INDIRECT, OR
# CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM
# LOSS OF USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT,
# NEGLIGENCE OR OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN
# CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS SOFTWARE.
----------------------------------------------------------

--set AppleScript variables
--set setName to "INSERT SET NAME HERE" --you can set the set name here if you wish, or use the KM variable
set winName to "Create new Typinator Item"

### Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+ ###
set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"
tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
	set xRes to getvariable "local_xRes" instance kmInst
	set yRes to getvariable "local_yRes" instance kmInst
	set setName to getvariable "local_setName" instance kmInst --set AppleScript variable to set name supplied by KM
end tell

--create a new entry from clipboard
tell application "Typinator"
	--create from selection
	create from clipboard
end tell

tell application "System Events"
	tell application process "Typinator"
		
		--wait until the Typinator window appears
		repeat until window winName exists
			delay 0.1
		end repeat
		
		--set Typinator window position
		tell window winName
			set winSize to its size
			set winXsize to item 1 of winSize
			set winYsize to item 2 of winSize
			set its position to {(xRes - winXsize) / 2, (yRes - winYsize) / 2}
		end tell
		
		--wait until the set menu appears
		repeat until pop up button 1 of window winName exists
			delay 0.1
		end repeat
		
		if value of pop up button 1 of window winName is setName then
			
			--do nothing if current set is already English auto correction
			
		else
			
			--click the set menu
			click pop up button 1 of window winName
			
			--wait until English auto correction is in the menu
			repeat until menu item setName of menu 1 of pop up button 1 of window winName exists
				delay 0.1
			end repeat
			
			--select the English auto correction menu item
			click menu item setName of menu 1 of pop up button 1 of window winName
			
		end if
		
		--sets focus to Correction field
		set value of attribute "AXFocused" of text field 2 of group 1 of window "Create new Typinator Item" to true
		
		--pauses until suggestions button exists
		repeat until menu button 1 of group 1 of window winName exists
			delay 0.1
		end repeat
		
		--check is there are any suggestions
		if name of menu button 1 of group 1 of window "Create new Typinator Item" is "No Suggestions" then
			
			--sets KM variable to indicate there are no suggestions
			set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"
			tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
				setvariable "instance_suggestionsExist" instance kmInst to "false"
			end tell
			
		else
			
			--clicks the suggestion button
			click menu button 1 of group 1 of window winName
			
			--sets KM variable to indicate there are suggestions
			set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"
			tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
				setvariable "instance_suggestionsExist" instance kmInst to "true"
			end tell
			
		end if
		
	end tell
end tell

Actions.ActionName: Pause until correction is selected and replace the original word
Pause until ↩ or ⎋ keys are down (15 second timeout)
Cancel macro if ⎋ key is down, otherwise continue
Hit return after selecting suggestion to exit Typinator window
